    Package Description
    org.apache.lucene.spatial.prefix
    Prefix Tree Strategy.

    • Uses of PrefixTreeStrategy in org.apache.lucene.spatial.prefix

      Subclasses of PrefixTreeStrategy in org.apache.lucene.spatial.prefix 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  NumberRangePrefixTreeStrategy
      A PrefixTree based on Number/Date ranges.
      class  RecursivePrefixTreeStrategy
      A PrefixTreeStrategy which uses AbstractVisitingPrefixTreeQuery.
      class  TermQueryPrefixTreeStrategy
      A basic implementation of PrefixTreeStrategy using a large TermInSetQuery of all the cells from SpatialPrefixTree.getTreeCellIterator(org.locationtech.spatial4j.shape.Shape, int).
      Methods in org.apache.lucene.spatial.prefix with parameters of type PrefixTreeStrategy

      Calculates spatial 2D facets (aggregated counts) in a grid, sometimes called a heatmap.

      Computes facets using a callback/visitor style design, allowing flexibility for the caller to determine what to do with each underlying count.
